When two sides separated by just a single point meet at the Stadio Renato Dall'Ara, something has to give. The form book clearly favors the visitors heading into this encounter.

The problem has been in the final third, where creative spark has been lacking. Their inability to convert half-chances into clear scoring opportunities has become a recurring theme. Set pieces might offer their best route to goal, given their struggles in open play.

For Bologna to get back on track, they'll need to harness the home crowd's energy and start aggressively. Disrupting Atalanta's build-up play and forcing them into rushed decisions could create the openings they desperately need.
